summary: Adds 2 spells that let you throw Riekling Spears like a Riekling. One spell is Regular Fire Riekling Spear and the other is Rapid Fire Riekling Spear. This spell also adds a Riekling NPC called Borguk The Travelling Riekling who has all the spells in his inventory. As of Update 1.1 there is a merchant called Riekling Ambassador who sells the Riekli
descriptionHtml: Have you ever wanted to throw a spear like a Riekling? You can now with 2 spells. There is a rapid fire version which rapidly throws the spears and a regular version. You get the spells off of Borguk The Travelling Riekling who is in Windhelm where you have to kill him and take the spells. This mod is tested and will not crash unless you pick up the spears. Do not pick up the spears and the game will work just fine. Riekling Ambassador will sell the spells so you don\'t have to kill Borguk. The update file is under the regular file so if you don\'t want to kill Borguk pick the one below.
author: Granky

files.name: RieklingSpearUPDATE
files.changelogHtml: Adds a new ambassador who sells the spells in Windhelm.
